name: Record of a Demon's Cultivation
summary:
What's the book about? It is about Demonic Cultivation!, If you cannot handle it, Please don't read it.

Synopsis:

When Song Wen killed the frail beggar who fought him over food and consumed his blood and soul, every cell in his body leaped with excitement. His spirit was exhilarated, and he realized then that his life would henceforth be filled with slaughter. For survival, for longevity, he would spare no effort, even if it meant creating mountains of corpses and seas of blood.
author: CinderTL
